Interface SensorConstants

All Known Subinterfaces:
ADSensorPort, BasicSensorPort, I2CPort, LegacySensorPort
All Known Implementing Classes:
ColorLightSensor, ColorSensor, CompassSensor, EOPD, GyroSensor, I2CSensor, IRLink, IRSeeker, LDCMotor, LightSensor, LMotor, LSC, LServo, MSC, MServo, NXTCam, NXTe, NXTLineLeader, OpticalDistanceSensor, PFLink, PFMate, PSPNXController, RCXLightSensor, RCXLink, RCXMotorMultiplexer, RCXRotationSensor, RCXSensorMultiplexer, RCXTemperatureSensor, RemoteSensorPort, RFIDSensor, SensorPort, SoundSensor, TiltSensor, TouchSensor, UltrasonicSensor
public interface SensorConstants

Constants used to set Sensor types and modes.
